mapper.select: select i.i_name as 机构名称, tr_type.description as 业务种类, ii.CORE_SYS_CUSTOMER_CODE as 客户号, ii.i_fullname as 客户全称, tr.i_name as 产品名称, tr.a_type as 债券性质, TRIM(to_char(cast(tr.ordcount as decimal(31,6)),'999,999,999,990.99')) as 结算金额, TRIM(to_char(cast(tr.bnd_ytm * 100 as decimal(31,6)),'999,999,999,990.9999')) as 回购利率, tr.orddate as 交易日期, TRIM(to_char(cast(tr.ordamount as decimal(31,6)),'999,999,999,990.99')) as 回购金额, tr.operator as 执行人, tr.trader as 交易确认人, 'T+' || to_char(tr.setdays) 清算速度, tr.intordid as 成交单编号, case when cashlb.daycount = 'Actual/360' then 'A/360' when cashlb.daycount = 'Actual/365' then 'A/365F' when cashlb.daycount = 'Actual/365 (Fixed)' then 'A/365' when cashlb.daycount = 'Actual/Actual (ISMA)' then 'A/A(ISMA)' when cashlb.daycount = '30/360 (Bond Basis)' then '30/360' else 'A/365' end as 计息基准, cashlb.start_date as 首期结算日期, TRIM(to_char(cast(cashlb.fst_set_amount as decimal(31,6)),'999,999,999,990.99')) as 首期结算金额, cashlb.mtr_date as 到期结算日期, TRIM(to_char(cast(cashlb.mtr_set_amount as decimal(31,6)),'999,999,999,990.99')) as 到期结算金额, substr(tr.i_name,1,instr(tr.i_name,'日')-1) as 回购期限 FROM TTRD_OTC_TRADE tr left join ttrd_cashlb cashlb on tr.i_code = cashlb.i_code LEFT JOIN ttrd_auth_user u on tr.operator_id = u.user_id LEFT JOIN TTRD_INSTITUTION i ON u.i_id = TO_CHAR(i.i_id) left join ttrd_institution ii on tr.partyid = ii.i_id LEFT JOIN ttrd_trade_type tr_type on tr.trdtype = tr_type.trd_type where tr.sysordid = #{sysOrdId} and tr.ref_sysordid is null
